hero.description: Premium streetwear essentials and accessories for the bold. Designed in Montreal.

process.title: From Screen to Street
process.subtitle: The easiest way to get fresh gear.
process.designDesc: Pick from our curated drops or upload your own art to our custom builder.
process.printDesc: Museum-grade inks on heavyweight cotton. Every pixel perfect.
process.deliverDesc: Shipped from Montreal in 3-5 days. Tracking link sent straight to you.

categories.title: Shop by Category
categories.hoodies: Cozy and warm for any season

featuredProducts.moreProducts: Want to see more awesome designs?

featuredProducts.noProducts: No featured products available at the moment.

about.title: Our Story
about.whyText: We believe everyone deserves to express themselves through quality clothing that doesn't break the bank. Every piece is designed with passion and attention to detail.
about.qualityText: We personally test every product. If we wouldn't wear it ourselves, we won't sell it to you. Quality is our promise.
about.missionText: Building a community of individuals who value quality, creativity, and authentic self-expression through fashion.
about.ctaText: Every purchase supports a small business with big dreams.

newsletter.title: Don't Sleep On Drops.
newsletter.description: Join the inner circle. Get early access, exclusive discounts, and no spam.
newsletter.success: Welcome to the inner circle! Check your email.
newsletter.errorGeneral: Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Streetwear for the modern creative. High quality fits, unique designs.
